src:
Hari Ini 54 Desa di Kebumen Gelar Pilkades Serentak
05 Nov 2019, 08:06 by Farhan Marzuki


Hari Ini 54 Desa di Kebumen Gelar Pilkades Serentak

KBRN, Kebumen: Selasa (5/11/2019) hari ini Pilkades serentak tahap III Kabupaten Kebumen digelar. Sebanyak 54 Desa di 21 Kecamatan di Kebumen Jawa Tengah akan memilih pemimpin baru mereka. Data pada Dinas Pemberdayaan Masyarakat Desa (Dispermades) Kabupaten Kebumen, dari total 54 Desa yang menggelar Pilkades, 154 calon Kades akan berlaga dengan 23 diantaranya adalah petahana.
Sejumlah persiapan menuju pesta demokrasi tingkat desa hari ini berlangsung aman dan kondusif. Hal tersebut disampaikan Wakil Bupati Kebumen Arif Sugiyanto usai melakukan monitoring dan checking akhir persiapan Pilkades Senin (4/11/2019). Monitoring menyasar 5 desa di dua kecamatan yakni kecamatan Kebumen dan kecamatan Alian.
Disampaikan Wakil Bupati, berdasarkan hasil monitoring bersama sejumlah pihak, seluruh panitia pemilihan telah siap untuk menggelar Pilkades. Dirinya pun optimis perhelatan Pilkades serentak akan berjalan dengan lancar dan damai.
"Kami tidak menemukan laporan adanya kendala berarti selama tahap persiapan. Juga, tensi masyarakat pemilih sehari jelang pencoblosan aman dan kondusif," katanya saat ditemui RRI di Desa Mengkowo Senin sore.
Ia berpesan kepada seluruh calon kades yang akan berlaga agar bersaing secara sehat dan menggunakan cara-cara yang tidak melanggar hukum seperti politik uang. Selain Wakil Bupati Ketua DPRD Kebumen bersama Damdim 0709/Kebumen, Kapolres, dan Sekda juga melakukan monitoring ke sejumlah desa di kecamatan Poncowarno dan Kutowinangun.
text:
Today 54 Villages in Kebumen Hold Pilkades Simultaneously
05 Nov 2019, 08:06 by Farhan Marzuki


Today 54 Villages in Kebumen Hold Pilkades Simultaneously

KBRN, Kebumen: Tuesday (11/5/2019) today, the simultaneous Pilkades phase III of Kebumen Regency was held. A total of 54 villages in 21 subdistricts in Kebumen, Central Java, will elect their new leaders. Data from the Village Community Empowerment Agency (Dispermades) of Kebumen Regency, from a total of 54 villages that hold Pilkades, 154 prospective village heads will compete with 23 of them incumbent.
A number of preparations for the democratic party at the village level today are safe and conducive. This was conveyed by Deputy Regent of Kebumen Arif Sugiyanto after monitoring and checking the final preparations for the Pilkades on Monday (11/04/2019). Monitoring targets 5 villages in two sub-districts namely Kebumen and Alian sub-districts.
Delivered Deputy Regent, based on the results of monitoring together with a number of parties, the entire election committee was ready to hold Pilkades. He was also optimistic that the Pilkades event would run smoothly and peacefully at the same time.
"We did not find any reports of significant obstacles during the preparation stage. Also, the tension of the voting community a day ahead of the voting was safe and conducive," he said when met by RRI in Mengkowo village on Monday afternoon.
He advised all village head candidates who would compete to compete in a healthy manner and use methods that did not violate the law such as money politics. In addition to the Deputy Regent, Chairman of the Kebumen DPRD along with Damdim 0709 / Kebumen, the Police Chief and the Regional Secretary also monitored a number of villages in the Poncowarno and Kutowinangun districts.
